ProSports NBA transactions

Source: R/pst.R
pst_transaction.Rd

Returns data matching specified parameters

pst_transaction(
  person = "Jarrett Jack",
  team = NULL,
  date_from = NULL,
  date_to = NULL,
  include_trades = T,
  include_injury_list_movement = T,
  include_g_league_movement = T,
  include_injury_missed_games = T,
  include_personal_missed_games = T,
  include_discipline = T,
  include_criminal_incidents = T,
  return_message = T
)

Arguments

person

if not NULL vector of person name
team

if not NULL vector of team name
date_from

if not NULL vector of dates
date_to

if not NULL vector of person name
include_trades

if TRUE includes trades
include_injury_list_movement

if TRUE includes injury list
include_g_league_movement

if TRUE includes g-league movement
include_injury_missed_games

if TRUE includes injury missed games
include_personal_missed_games

if TRUE include personal missed games
include_discipline

if TRUE include disciple
include_criminal_incidents

if TRUE include criminal incidents
return_message

if TRUE returns a message

Value

a tibble

Examples

pst_transaction(person = NULL, team = "Nets")
